description:
Replace scattered query logic with reusable, composable specification objects that encapsulate business rules for filtering and querying entities. Specifications can be combined, tested independently, and reused across repositories.

**Rationale:** With features like advanced search filters, bulk actions, and custom reports requiring complex queries, the specification pattern centralizes query logic, makes it unit-testable without database dependencies, reduces duplication, and improves query maintainability.
title: Implement Specification Pattern for Complex Queries
